settings.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.desc:
How thin are the cases?

Matte cases are 0.02” thin, which is about as thin as your finger nail. This is our thinnest option and is best for the ultimate minimalist.

Transparent cases are 0.03” thin, which is about as thin as a dime. It’s shock- absorbing material is great if you’re looking for more protection.

Leather cases are 0.03” thin. It’s one of the thinnest and sleekest leather cases you can find.

What are the cases made of?

Matte cases are made of polypropylene, a hard yet flexible plastic. It’s super durable, lightweight and adds extra grip.

Transparent cases are made of TPU, a flexible, rubber-like plastic. It's shock absorbing, grippy, and won’t yellow over time.

Leather cases are made with a genuine leather backing. The frame of the cases use the same thin plastic as the matte cases.

Do your cases protect from drops?

Our cases are designed to offer everyday protection from bumps, scratches, dust, and dirt. Don’t let the thinness fool you though – we’ve heard many customer stories of how our case protected their phone from minor drops!

If you’re looking for the most protection, our transparent case is the perfect choice.

Do they have a lip to protect the camera?

Yep. All our cases have a subtle lip that extends beyond the camera to ensure it is protected when you set your device down.

Do they have a lip to protect the screen?

Our cases do not have a “front lip” to protect your screen, so we recommend pairing our cases with one of our tempered glass screen protectors.

Do they work with wireless charging?

Yep. Our cases are so slim that they won’t interfere with our wireless chargers, or any other charger for that matter.

settings.headline: More grip. Less bulk.
settings.desc: Our thin iPhone XS Max case offers scratch protection, adds grip and keeps your phone slim and sleek.

settings.headline: Everyday protection.
settings.desc: This case covers every corner of your phone and features a camera lens “lip” for added protection.

settings.headline: 3 finish options.
settings.desc: Like a brushed finish? Go matte. Looking for invisible protection? Transparent all the way. Want a sophisticated backing? Leather is for you.

settings.headline: Minimalistic design.
settings.desc:
This case maintains the original look of your
iPhone XS Max. No branding. No bulk. No nonsense

settings.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.desc:
How thin are the cases?

Matte cases are 0.02” thin, which is about as thin as your finger nail. This is our thinnest option and is best for the ultimate minimalist.

Transparent cases are 0.03” thin, which is about as thin as a dime. It’s shock- absorbing material is great if you’re looking for more protection.

Leather cases are 0.03” thin. It’s one of the thinnest and sleekest leather cases you can find.

What are the cases made of?

Matte cases are made of polypropylene, a hard yet flexible plastic. It’s super durable, lightweight and adds extra grip.

Transparent cases are made of TPU, a flexible, rubber-like plastic. It's shock absorbing, grippy, and won’t yellow over time.

Leather cases are made with a genuine leather backing. The frame of the cases use the same thin plastic as the matte cases.

Do your cases protect from drops?

Our cases are designed to offer everyday protection from bumps, scratches, dust, and dirt. Don’t let the thinness fool you though – we’ve heard many customer stories of how our case protected their phone from minor drops!

If you’re looking for the most protection, our transparent case is the perfect choice.

Do they have a lip to protect the camera?

Yep. All our cases have a subtle lip that extends beyond the camera to ensure it is protected when you set your device down.

Do they have a lip to protect the screen?

Our cases do not have a “front lip” to protect your screen, so we recommend pairing our cases with one of our tempered glass screen protectors.

Do they work with wireless charging?

Yep. Our cases are so slim that they won’t interfere with our wireless chargers, or any other charger for that matter.

settings.desc: If you’re not thrilled with your order in the first 30 days, just send it back. Returns are always free and easy. Pinky promise.

settings.headline: The perfect case.
settings.desc: Thoughtfully designed to offer everything you need in an iPhone case, and nothing you don’t.

settings.headline: Everyday protection.
settings.desc: Our case keeps your phone looking like new by protecting it from scratches and minor drops. It also features a raised "lip" around the camera to prevent damage to the lenses.

settings.headline: Super thin design.
settings.desc: Show off your iPhone's original design and slim profile with our barely-there case.

settings.headline: Durable materials.
settings.desc:
Our matte case is made with hard, yet flexible, plastic. This is our thinnest option and is best for the ultimate minimalist.

Our transparent case is made with a soft, grippy material which is great for shock absorption.

settings.headline: Minimalistic design.
settings.desc: This case maintains the original look of your iPhone 11 Pro. No branding. No bulk. No nonsense.

settings.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.desc:
How thin are the cases?

Matte cases are 0.02” thin, which is about as thin as your finger nail. This is our thinnest option and is best for the ultimate minimalist.

Transparent cases are 0.03” thin, which is about as thin as a dime. It’s shock- absorbing material is great if you’re looking for more protection.

Leather cases are 0.06” thin, which is about as thin as quarter. It’s one of the thinnest and sleekest leather cases you can find.

What are the cases made of?

Matte cases are made of polypropylene, a hard yet flexible plastic. It’s super durable, lightweight and adds extra grip.

Transparent cases are made of TPU, a flexible, rubber-like plastic. It's shock absorbing, grippy, and won’t yellow over time.

Leather cases are made of top-grain leather. The interior features a micro-fiber lining to protect against scratches.

Do your cases protect from drops?

Our cases are designed to offer everyday protection from bumps, scratches, dust, and dirt. Don’t let the thinness fool you though – we’ve heard many customer stories of how our case protected their phone from minor drops!

If you’re looking for the most protection, our transparent case is the perfect choice.

Do they have a lip to protect the camera?

Yep. All our cases have a subtle lip that extends beyond the camera to ensure it is protected when you set your device down.

Do they have a lip to protect the screen?

Our matte cases and transparent cases do not have a “front lip” to protect your screen, so we recommend pairing our cases with one of our tempered glass screen protectors.

Our leather cases do have a “front lip” to help protect your screen when face down.

Do they work with wireless charging?

Yep. Our cases are so slim that they won’t interfere with our wireless chargers, or any other charger for that matter.

settings.desc: If you’re not thrilled with your order in the first 30 days, just send it back. Returns are always free and easy. Pinky promise.

Matte cases are made of polypropylene, a hard yet flexible plastic. It’s super durable, lightweight and adds extra grip.

Transparent cases are made of TPU, a flexible, rubber-like plastic. It's shock absorbing, grippy, and won’t yellow over time.

Do your cases protect from drops?

Our cases are designed to offer everyday protection from bumps, scratches, dust, and dirt. Don’t let the thinness fool you though – we’ve heard many customer stories of how our case protected their phone from minor drops!

If you’re looking for the most protection, our transparent case is the perfect choice.

Do they have a lip to protect the camera?

Yep. All our cases have a subtle lip that extends beyond the camera to ensure it is protected when you set your device down.

Do they have a lip to protect the screen?

Our matte cases and transparent cases do not have a “front lip” to protect your screen, so we recommend pairing our cases with one of our tempered glass screen protectors.

Do they work with wireless charging?

Yep. Our cases are so slim that they won’t interfere with our wireless chargers, or any other charger for that matter.

settings.headline: Kills germs and bacteria.
settings.desc:
Your phone is 18x dirtier than a public toilet (yuck!). Our sanitizer uses safe UVC rays to eliminate germs and bacteria from your device.
Our sanitizer kills germs and bacteria, but we do not currently have a way to test its effectiveness against COVID19.

settings.headline: Fast wireless charging.
settings.desc:
Our UV phone sanitizer doubles as a fast wireless charging pad that works with all Qi enabled devices.
10W max for Samsung devices. 7.5W max for iPhones
Fast charging requires QC 2.0/3.0 adapter (not included).

settings.headline: Specifications.
settings.desc:
Interior dimensions: 6.4 x 3.9 x 0.9 in
Exterior dimensions: 8.27 x 4.72 x 2.44 in

Ultraviolet light output: 2W (Max)
Wireless charging output: 10W (Max)

In the box: UV sanitizer + USB power cable (1m)

settings.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.desc:
How does the UV sanitizer work?

Our sanitizer uses dual UV lights to emit UVC rays which break apart and destroy germ DNA, leaving your device clean and sterile.

Does it protect against COVID-19?

Only the CDC has access to the novel strain of the virus, so we do not currently have a way to test our sanitizer's effectiveness against COVID19.

How long does it take to clean?

Our sanitizer has two cleaning modes: standard (30 minutes) and express (18 minutes). We recommend the standard mode if you’re looking for maximum sterilization.

Does it clean both sides of my phone?

Yep. Our sanitizer will clean all sides so there's no need to flip your phone over for another cycle.

Can it charge & clean at the same time?

The wireless charging surface is located on the lid of the sanitizer, so the device that is being cleaned will not be charged. However, if you want to charge one device and clean another at the same time, both functions will work simultaneously.

Which phones will fit in the sanitizer?

Almost all of the most popular devices will fit with a few exceptions. All iPhone and Pixel phones will comfortably fit. Same with most Galaxy phones, with the exception of the S20 Ultra and the Note series.

Will it sanitize items other than phones?

Yep. Our sanitizer works great for AirPods, keys, wallets, glasses, credit cards, face masks, and more.
